title: Streaming League Concept Art and Skin Design!
body:
Hey nubs!

Swing by and check out some League concept art and skin design stuff over at twitch! Specifically, over the next few days I'll be tackling Taric's redesign in response to IronStylus' thread. Come hang out and chat or just come by to request a skin idea!

[twitch.tv/jburan](http://www.twitch.tv/jburan)

JB
[jpm1023.deviantart.com](http://jpm1023.deviantart.com)

replies.body:
That looks cool!
You draw skin ideas?
